static XmlDocument FilterSortTheStoreResponse (XmlDocument response, object dataSetObjectResponse, string filter, string sort, int startIndex, int blockSize)
 Filter and Sort the Store Response PaymentItems Response. The Filter is similiar to the where clause in a SQL Statement. ("AND and "OR" can be used"); All nodes are refered to by the NodeName_Attribute (TableName_Column) to filter on. For example Filter ==> itemOffer_title Like 'basic' Sort ==> itemOffer_endDate desc, item_itemTypeName asc.

static XmlDocument Hangout.Server.PaymentItemsSortFilter.FilterSortTheStoreResponse ( XmlDocument  response,
object  dataSetObjectResponse,
string  filter,
string  sort,
int  startIndex,
int  blockSize 
) [static]

Filter and Sort the Store Response PaymentItems Response. The Filter is similiar to the where clause in a SQL Statement. ("AND and "OR" can be used"); All nodes are refered to by the NodeName_Attribute (TableName_Column) to filter on. For example Filter ==> itemOffer_title Like 'basic' Sort ==> itemOffer_endDate desc, item_itemTypeName asc.

Parameters:
response The returned PaymentItems response
filter The Filter string to use in a form similiar to where clause in a SQL statement
sort Sort string to use in a form similiar to the orderby clause in a SQL statement
startIndex For Paging the start index of the block of data to return
blockSize For Paging the block size of the data to return
Returns:
static ResultFilter Hangout.Server.PaymentItemsSortFilter.GetFilterParameters ( PaymentCommand  command  )  [static]

Given a PaymentCommand returns the Filter Paramaters specified.

Parameters:
command PaymentCommand
Returns:
The Filter Paramaters specified in the Payment Command
static PaymentCommand Hangout.Server.PaymentItemsSortFilter.RemoveFilterFromCommand ( PaymentCommand  command  )  [static]

The Sorting, Filtering and Paging will be done post retrieve data from PaymentItems Therefore the GetStoreInventory will return all rows.

Parameters:
command PaymentCommand for the GetStoreInventory
Returns:
PaymentCommand without the filtering for the GetStoreInventory
